bugs.title: Offline data recovery fail but ECMS always show success
bugs.description: 导入离线应用数据失败，但ECMS显示成功(离线应用返回的状态是完成导入，但是数据没有被更新)
bugs.steps: 导入离线应用数据 -> 查看ECMS的进度监控中的数据是否发生变化

bugs.title: ECMS: Items are not much between screen display and report in VBIS information report
bugs.description: 审计日志报告中行动时间更改成开始时间和结束时间
bugs.steps: 审计日志报告 -> 查看数据表格中的行动时间列

bugs.title: ECMS: 设备管理菜单英文名和权限管理中的菜单权限中的设备管理菜单名称不一致
bugs.description: 设备管理菜单英文名和权限管理中的菜单权限中的设备管理菜单名称不一致
bugs.steps: 权限管理页面 -> 查看菜单权限中的设备管理菜单名称

bugs.title: ECMS: Report file name should use Traditional Chinese
bugs.description: 进度监控下载CRO报告和指定界别的报告，文件名称是简体中文
bugs.steps: 进度监控 -> 下载CRO报告和指定界别的报告

bugs.title: ECMS: Wrong title of pop-up message in offline data recovery
bugs.description: 离线数据恢复弹窗的标题名称不对
bugs.steps: 进度监控 -> 点击离线数据恢复 -> 查看弹窗的标题名称

bugs.title: ECMS: Incorrect layout of the list of Candidates for Drawing lots report
bugs.description: 抽签报告中的候选人列表布局不正确
bugs.steps: 抽签报告 -> 查看候选人列表

bugs.title: ECMS: 设备管理页面，设备列表中，程式版本字段没有随语言切换
bugs.description: 设备端报送的字段是不会区分语言的
bugs.steps: 设备管理页面 -> 查看设备列表中的程式版本字段

bugs.title: ECMS: 权限管理页面，菜单权限和按钮权限的文字描述有的是简体中文，且没有随着语言切换
bugs.description: 权限管理页面，菜单权限和按钮权限的文字描述有的是简体中文，且没有随着语言切换
bugs.steps: 权限管理页面 -> 查看菜单权限和按钮权限的文字描述

bugs.title: ECMS: Incorrect title shows in "Offline data recovery"
bugs.description: 导入离线数据应用表格中的字段等文案不正确
bugs.steps: 导入离线数据应用 -> 查看表格中的字段等文案

bugs.title: ECMS - Device Control - No "In Progress" image for VBIS
bugs.description: 设备管理，设备控制弹窗中VBIS图标没有in Progress状态图标
bugs.steps: 设备管理 -> 点击设备控制 -> 查看状态图标

bugs.title: Role management issue. User without priviledge can view and operate the Election Activity Management page(没有活动管理页面权限的用户登录后能访问活动管理页面)
bugs.description:
A user assigned to "Command center user" should only be able to access "Equipment Management", "Counting progress" and "Election result management" pages. He shouldn't be able to modify the election activities.
However, at the first login, ECMS loads http://192.168.0.11/home and display the Election Activity Management page, and it lets user able to click whatever on that page. It shouldn't be allowed.It shouldn't be allowed. 
 Once he navigator to other functional sections (such as Equipment Management), he will not able to access the Election Management page. 
 The same happens to other user roles that shouldn't be able to operate the election activity.
bugs.steps: 选择没有活动管理页面权限的角色，绑定用户，登录查看

bugs.title: Recount function without RO, and auto authorized successful
bugs.description:
Device Management -> Click icon (right upper) -> Recount
login user has Device Management with recount access only, without RO access.
But the authorized successful automatically, and without insert RO U
bugs.steps: Device Management -> Click icon (right upper) -> Recount

bugs.title: Wording issue for "severs", it should be servers
bugs.description:
Initialisation popup window:
• 错误: Please confirm to execute data initialisation for all devices and severs
• 正确: Please confirm to execute data initialisation for all devices and servers
bugs.steps: Device Management -> Click icon (right upper) -> Data Initialisation

bugs.title: ECMS: Server error when Consolidation
bugs.description: Server error when select all subsectors to consolidate.
bugs.steps:
1. Election Result Management > Votes Consolidation > Select All Subsectors
2. Consolidate
3. "Server error" appear

bugs.title: ECMS: Error message when export User Audit Trial Report
bugs.description: User Audit Trial Report can't be exported and error message appear
bugs.steps:
1. System Management > Audit report management > User Audit Trial Report
2. Export
3. Error message appear

bugs.title: ECMS: Incorrect report title and No "Device no." data display
bugs.description:
• Batch message report: No "Device no." data display and report title is correct
• Batch scanning summary report: No "Device no." data display and report title is correct
bugs.steps:
1. System Management > Audit report management > Batch message report
2. System Management > Audit report management > Batch scanning summary report
bugs.note: 需要转设备端(标题已改,数据设备端未报)

bugs.title: ECMS: Some data still display as English after language change
bugs.description: The data of "Module" and Action name" still display as English in User Audit Trial Report after change application language to Traditional Chinese
bugs.steps:
1. Change application language to Traditional Chinese
2. System Management > Audit report management > User Audit Trial Report
3. Some data still display in English
bugs.note: 不是bug，待退回(设备端已沟通只支持英文)

bugs.title: ECMS: Batch data can't be shown after switch
bugs.description: Batch data can't be shown after switch between "All" and "Device number" in "Device no." under "Enquire Batch in VBIS"

bugs.title: ECMS - Close Counting - wording issue in Confirm message
bugs.description:
• 错误: ... These devices may not be able to start counting....
• 正确: ... These devices may not be able to Close counting....

bugs.title: ECMS: No data import from HSS0.5 & VBIS when use offline data recovery
bugs.description: During import data, it will show 100% imported but there is no data display on related subsector in progress monitoring
bugs.note: 需要转离线数据导入应用处理

fixed-pending-verification.label: 已修复，待验证
fixed-pending-verification.description: 问题已修复，等待验证确认

transfer.label: 需要转移
